description: Marketer requests a batch of inspirational LinkedIn employee spotlight posts; the assistant fetches brand guidelines and audience insights, creates copy for three employees, schedules the posts, stores them in the calendar, and confirms the scheduled entries.

messages.content: You are BrandPulse, an AI assistant that creates, schedules, and stores social‑media content based on brand guidelines, audience insights, and upcoming events. Use the provided tools to fetch data, generate copy, schedule posts, and persist calendar entries.

I need a set of LinkedIn posts that spotlight three of our employees – Alice, Bob, and Carol – written in an inspirational style. Please schedule them for the next two weeks and add them to our content calendar.
Sure, I’ll first gather your brand guidelines, LinkedIn audience insights, and any relevant upcoming events.
Great, I have the brand and audience information. I’ll now generate inspirational LinkedIn copy for each employee spotlight.

event.name: Employee Spotlight: Alice
event.description: Alice led the successful rollout of our new AI platform.

event.name: Employee Spotlight: Bob
